reviews.review_msg: Chris is the chillest dude ever. He manages to keep his class discussions so interesting. His courses are easy if your existing writing skills do not need much polishing. Best prof I've had in uni!
Great professor. Learned so much from him. For my entire Economics academia journey, I think this class and this prof light up my passion in this path.

Chris is a great teacher. He reads your stuff and gives feedback that can help you score higher next time, and more importantly, improve your writing. He will provide straightforward critique and advice on your writing, and what he expects to read in your next one, which is very helpful. Speak in class discussions and read papers critically.
Great Prof. Great class. Loved it.
Excellent Professor. Always willing to help out the student so the know the material. Very skilled at presenting the material in an easy manner. Exams are slightly easier than most.
